root.name: Dance Dance Revolution 5thMIX
root.description: OverviewDance Dace Revolution 5thMIX (usually shortened to DDR 5th Mix) is the fifth game in the Dance Dance Revolution franchise. It introduces "long version" songs to the series, and is the last arcade release until SuperNOVA to feature characters dancing in the background."Long Version" Songs"Long version" songs are marked on the song selection screen."Long version" songs are twice as long as standard ones, and provide players an extra test of endurance. To compensate for the extra length, when a player selects ones of these songs it counts as two stages. This is especially useful information when playing at the arcade since it gives you one less song per play.This feature has not appeared in any future games in the series.Home/Arcade LinkIf you have a memory card with save data from the Playstation version of the game or previous games in the series that shares songs in the arcade version, some arcade machines have slots in which you can use your memory card. This can be used to save high scores or use custom charts in the arcade.SoundtrackThe arcade and home versions have different songs available.Arcade (Japan)Song TitleArtistBasicTrickManiac.59DJ Taka4671,2,3,4,007Ni-Ni13617才Bambee256AbsoluteDJ Taka358AbyssDJ Taka257Afronova Primeval8-Bit469Against All Odds (Definitive Mix)Dejavu featuring Tasmin357B4UNaoki458B4U Glorious Style [Long Version]Naoki469Baby Baby Gimme Your LoveDivas136Be TogetherNi-Ni357Boom Boom Dollar (K.O.G G3 Mix)King Kong D.
